thread.title: The 13 Most Heroic Dogs on Instagram
thread.title_full: The 13 Most Heroic Dogs on Instagram

author: jnosek1
title: The 13 Most Heroic Dogs on Instagram
text:
The 13 Most Heroic Dogs on Instagram ​These pups are worth a double tap By Lindsay Lowe March 22, 2017 Instagram.com/lifeofpikelet, mynameislentil, tunameltsmyheart 
No matter how many Instagram followers you have, chances are there will always be a dog with more. Instagram is overflowing with canine celebrities, and many of them aren’t just famous for being cute. 
Some are heroes, too—like Ricochet the Golden Retriever, who teaches veterans and people with special needs how to surf. And there’s Lentil, a French Bulldog with a cleft palate who helps kids feel better about their own facial differences. Other Instagram pups use their general cuteness for a good cause, helping their owners raise thousands of dollars for rescue groups and other charities. 
The first annual Ultimate Men's Health Dog Search is launching soon! Follow for updates and don't forget to submit your pup for the chance to be featured in an upcoming issue. 
Check out 13 of the most heroic, inspiring dogs on Instagram. These special canines are definitely worth a double tap.
